resources.string: Fixing completed, a reboot may be required
\n[ERROR: This error may be caused by the lack of ROOT permissions or the fact that the manufacturer has made your device incompatible with this fix]

"This app ONLY fixes software related issues.

If your sensor won't become fixed, you should take your phone to the technical service.

I Hope this will help.

Please keep in mind that this fix does not work in all devices, be kind and don't downvote me if your device isn't compatible."
This app is licensed under GPLv3.\n\nCheck the code at https://github.com/GrenderG/ProximitySensorFixer
Keep in mind that this device may be INCOMPATIBLE with the fix
This device should be COMPATIBLE with the fix
Can\'t find normal value, trying another option…
This app will not work properly without root permissions.

IMPORTANT: If this solution does not work for you, try the 'Force recalibration' option located at the app's menu (top right)

If you want your sensor to be calibrated on every phone boot, don't uninstall the app
Recalibration completed, a reboot is required.
